EmailTemplate.description: Response for Time Webinar Series pt 2
EmailTemplate.name: Webinar Response - Oct08 Time Webinar Series pt2
EmailTemplate.subject: IntApp Time Builder Webinar
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
{!Lead.FirstName} {!Lead.LastName}:
Thank you for registering for the IntApp Time Builder webinar. Date: Wednesday, November 5 Time: 10 am Pacific / 1 pm Eastern
Video:
Conference URL: http://e-meetings.mci.com/nc/join.php?i=SV56561&p=time&t=c Conference/Meeting Number: SV56561 Conference/Meeting Passcode: time
Audio:
Conference Audio Dial In: 888-994-8797 (give operator the passcode: "TIME" and conference leader's name: "Don Coleman")
Please log in and dial the conference audio line 10 minutes prior to the start time.
http://www.intapp.com All information Copyright 2008 IntApp, Inc. All rights reserved.
